text: "The Bitch Is Back" is a 1974 song by Elton John and is the second single from his eighth studio album Caribou. It went to number 4 in the United States, number 53 in Australia, number 26 in the Netherlands, number 15 in the United Kingdom and number 1 in Canada. Several radio stations refused and vetoed to play in the United States and elsewhere because of the word bitch. == References == Category:1974 songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Tina Turner songs Category:Rihanna songs Category:Miley Cyrus songs
title: The Bitch Is Back
